pli-tv-pvr6:1.1: It is noteworthy that it is not called the Great Chapter. “Full ordination” is close to what this chapter is called in other schools, that is, “going forth”.
pli-tv-pvr6:1.4: SP 4.320: Dve āpattiyoti ūnavīsativassaṁ upasampādentassa pācittiyaṁ, sesesu sabbapadesu dukkaṭaṁ, “Two offenses: there is an offense entailing confession for one ordaining a person less than twenty years old.
